summary:
A small, simple beginning of game residence, at the end of Helgen's cave exit.
Designed for low level, beginning characters, of all types.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple small home.

It is based on VANILLA Skyrim. Nothing additional from the other DLC's, so no compatibility problems.

Designed to be a restocking station for Helgen, and it's troops, it is generic enough, to be assumed authority over early on, and not be worried about.

It has a little bit of everything here, ready for use.

Cloth, Leather, Iron & Steel Armor
A couple weapons for each weapon group
Some additional spell books, and soul gems
Some extra money
Some extra food
Work benches for repair, replace, or creation of items.
Shrine to Mara
Amulets of Mara and Talos
A few small magic items, or low power, to aid a beginning character (rings & Amulets)

Supply boxes that do NOT respawn.
** NOTE ** : The food storage IS designed to respawn! Head's up!

Provides a map marker at the entrance of the cave.

A Lumber axe, and a pick axe

==

Uninstall

Unclick the mod from your load order.

==

Update 1.1

Fixed the workbench, so you aren't working on the wrong side of the wall.
author: Rex1029 aka Pan Dragondagger
